home__description: Familiar with mainstream programming languages such as Python and Java, passionate about web development with full-stack development experience.
about__description: As a Computer Science student at USTB (Project 211 University), I have built a solid theoretical foundation. I am passionate about programming, familiar with mainstream languages like Python, C, and Java, and capable in front-end development stack. With basic English skills (CET-4/6) and team collaboration experience, I excel in technical communication and project cooperation.
portfolio1__description:
A hospital registration system based on Spring Boot + Vue.js. Responsible for developing core modules including user management, appointment registration, and doctor scheduling. Implemented features like real-time booking, intelligent triage, and multi-dimensional query.
Tech Stack: Spring Boot, Vue.js, Element UI, MySQL, Redis
Development Period: 2023.09 - 2023.12
portfolio2__description:
An online food delivery system based on Flask + Vue.js. Independently completed system design and development, including user-end, merchant-end, and admin-end. Implemented features such as product management, order processing, and real-time order tracking.
Tech Stack: Flask, Vue.js, Element UI, MySQL, Redis, Celery
Development Period: 2023.03 - 2023.06
awards1__title: Second Prize in the 25th 'Cradle Cup' Student Innovation Competition of USTB
awards2__title: Silver Award in 'Youth Innovation Beijing' 2024 Capital Challenge Cup
awards2__description: Project: Optical Scanning for Smart Connected Vehicles - Safety Protection Technology Based on Optical Frequency Scanning
awards1__detail: Project Description: Designed and implemented a smart soldering station system with precise temperature control, automatic standby, over-temperature protection, and other features to improve soldering safety and efficiency.
awards2__detail: Project Description: A safety protection technology for intelligent connected vehicles based on optical frequency scanning. Using high-performance scanning laser as the system light source, it forms two advanced sensing systems: Frequency Modulated Continuous Wave (FMCW) and Optical Frequency Domain Reflectometry (OFDR), which can reconstruct the three-dimensional space around the vehicle and the temperature/strain field of the power battery respectively.
portfolio1__overview:
A hospital registration system based on Spring Boot + Vue.js. Responsible for system architecture design and core function development:
• Design and implement user authentication and permission management system
• Use Redis for source locking and concurrency control
• Develop doctor scheduling and smart appointment system
• Implement real-time appointment and intelligent triage functions
portfolio1__feature1: Implement permission management based on Spring Security
portfolio1__feature2: Redis for concurrency control and system optimization
portfolio1__feature3: Develop scheduling system and intelligent triage
portfolio1__feature4: Implement real-time source management and auto-triage
portfolio2__overview:
An online food delivery system based on Flask + Vue.js. Independently completed system design and development:
• Design and implement user-end, merchant-end and admin-end
• Use Redis for shopping cart and order management
• Develop product management and order processing system
• Implement real-time order tracking function
portfolio2__feature1: Implement backend microservices based on Flask
portfolio2__feature2: Redis for caching and queue management
portfolio2__feature3: Develop order management and delivery system
